title: Blognado
description: A full-stack blogging application where users can read, write, like, and share knowledge on various subjects built with react + nestjs + MongoDB

title: Multi Step Signup Form
description: A multi step sign up form with form validation with React + Redux

title: Automart
description: A MERN applicaion which is an online marketplace for automobiles, with Auto Mart users posting their cars for sale. (React + MongoDB + Express)

title: Chat App
description: A fullstack android chat application entirely from scratch. The backend service is created using Gin Framework (Golang) and the frontend with React Native
